ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We acknowledge the GCM modeling groups, the Program for Climate Model Diagnosis and Inter-comparison (PCMDI), and the WCRPâ€™s Working Group on Coupled Modeling for their roles in making available the WCRP CMIP5 multi-model datasets. The authors would like to thank the National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR) for providing the CRU data set. The authors are thankful to the National Climate Centre, India Meteorological Department for providing gridded data. All the figures were created using Interactive Data Language (IDL) version 8.2 ( http://www.harrisgeospatial.com/docs/whats_new_in_82.html). The authors would like to thank three anonymous reviewers whose comments helped considerably in improving the quality of this paper.
